Package com.cyc.query

Provides the core classes for constructing, specifying, and running Cyc queries.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    QueryAnswer
    Encodes one answer to a Query.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KBInferenceResultSet
    KBInferenceResultSet provides a class for easy access and manipulation of inference results.
    Query
    Query is designed to represent queries posed to Cyc and provide access to their results.
    Query.Category
    A class for categorizing queries.
    QueryAPIBuildInfo  
    QueryApiConstants  
    QueryListener
    This interface is one that must be implemented by anyone wishing to listen in on events generated by a Query.
    QueryReader
    Support for reading in a Query from XML.

Package com.cyc.query Description

Provides the core classes for constructing, specifying, and running Cyc queries. Queries are requests to Cyc to either confirm that something is true, or else to find bindings for open Variables that result in true sentences. They can be asked from different Contexts, and given different resource constraints, using InferenceParameters.

Results can be inspected either while a query is running, or after it has finished. QueryListeners can be defined to handle query-related events such as when new answers are found or the query exhausts.

Results can be processed either as QueryAnswers, or as SQL-style KBInferenceResultSets.
